data.description:
**Track Craft is a game where you collect toy cars, create your own tracks and race!**

# CHOOSE YOUR REALITY

Enjoy the game in Mixed Reality or switch to VR at any time.

{788852366612570}


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Conquer over 50 pre-designed levels spread across 3 totally different worlds.

{1573746946690233}


# CREATE YOUR OWN TRACKS

Craft your own tracks in the editor and share them online with the community.

{456809883759043}

# BECOME THE BEST

Experience thrilling head to head racing with other players, collect points, progress to better leagues and become the best!

{1040338457604110}



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

{1852298338568016}




# THE FUN NEVER ENDS

New community levels created by the players every day.




Available on Quest 3, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

Bugfixes
* Fixed bug that new players would not see new player tutorial

Improvements 
* All new avatars in multiplayer
* Added inverted air controls to settings
* Ghost cars now fade when close to them 
* Multiplayer room joins recommended room when all rooms empty
Fixed bug with replay

Improvements:

*Player options (left hand, MSAA, ground shadows) persist after reloading the game.
*More tracks are displayed in Community tracks.
*Smoother movement of cars has been implemented.
*Minor performance improvements have been made in multiplayer.
Bug Fixes:
*Replay saving should now be more reliable.
*An issue that would allow driving a car without timer to start has been fixed.
*High scores that took advantage of bugs have been cleared.

Improvements
*Multiplayer now has voice chat
*New matchmaking notification which will notify you if a multiplayer game is in progress so you can quickly join

Bugfixes
*Fixed score highlight in live ranking
*Room mesh would be used where it should  in some cases

Improvements
* Players can "like" community levels while playing them
* Surf Rock materials improved to look even more beautiful 
* Quest Pro improved performance 

Bug fixes
* Fixed issue where multiplayer rooms would show players that are not there
* Fixed issue with Quest Pro controllers not being detected correctly

V0.62 RELEASE NOTES - Happy Track Crafting!

New Features
* Multiplayer is here! Challenge up to 6-players and race for the winning podium on community and arcade tracks! 
* Controller haptics are added to get ultimate racing and crafting feedback.

Improvements
* Updated physics for smoother gameplay at higher car speeds
* Car handling is fine-tuned to be even more arcades, as we've heard your feedback!
* Fancier loading UI, including MR transition when launching the game in passthrough.
* New car ghost model designs for replays and multiplayer.
* Polished SFX in all track packs.
* Improved performance in many places - but mainly in Surf Rock.
* Your best score is now visible in the in-game high score UI
* New animation on Razzle Dazzle start & finish

Bugfixes
* Rudolf F40 now has a correct ghost.
* Portal entrances/exits are fixed in all track packs, making driving through them more accessible.
* Editor hand palette - removed buggy particles 
* Editor - Floating/specials now interact only in test drive mode to make building easier
* Fixed Razzle Dazzle finish colliders
